mdx.excerpt: AWS Distro for OpenTelemetry (ADOT) for Elastic Kubernetes Service (EKS) add-ons has introduced the ability to deploy an ADOT Collector during add-onâ€¦

frontmatter.title: ADOT for EKS add-ons announces advanced configuration for Collector deployment
frontmatter.description: This blog post announces the addition of Collector deployment to ADOT for EKS add-ons using add-ons advanced configuration.
